interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit, SOTICA 10Pairs Magnetic Lashes Natural False Eyelashes with Tweezers DIY Eyelash Extension Kit Authentic Eyelash Extension Look Easy to Use No Glue Needed…
Review Date: 2022/04/16
Store: Sotica
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.26 x 5.95 x 0.83 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CS-JM-8'}
Review Text: I have become a huge fan of magnetic eyelashes. The easy application is so great, it is hard to believe, until you try it yourself. It is as easy as applying eyeliner. The liquid liner has a the base in it that the magnetic lashes stick to. It doesn’t sound like that would work as well as it should, but it does. The best thing after the easy application is you can try different types of lashes, included in the set, to see which one is perfect for your makeup and wardrobe choice. I have friends that didn’t believe how great these are until I let them see them in person. I have tried many different brands, and this is an excellent choice if you are going to try them for the first time, or you have been using them already. Highly recommended!
Review Title: Awesome magnetic lashes, easy to use, and look great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner.
Alyxxndra
{'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'}
I am a huge fan of magnetic lashes in general , and these are great . These are an ideal solution to the lash dilemma many of us face. Mascara is a process to apply and still doesn’t give the dramatic results so many of us desire, regular false lashes have sticky glue to deal with and lead us to lose real lashes too. Then extensions are such a commitment. Magnetic lashes , like these especially are the solution.
Big fan
8PCS Headbands for Women Twist Knotted Boho Stretchy Hair Bands for Girls Criss Cross Turban Plain Headwrap Yoga Workout Vintage Hair Accessories, Solid Color，No Slip
MOLANLY
{'Color': 'Assorted', 'Material': 'Cloth', 'Fabric Type': 'Cloth', 'Brand': 'MOLANLY', 'Size': 'One size fits most', 'Package Dimensions': '10.43 x 6.42 x 2.09 inches; 6.74 Ounces'}
Just by chance, I got these at the same time as a set of colored scrunchies. Obviously you know when you would wear these, and like the other set of scrunchies, this has a nice variety of colors, so coordinating with your outfit has never been easier. I don’t think I will ever just buy a set of dark neutral colors again. I would rather have the option to match my outfit, and also my mood! Highly recommended!
Perfect set of many different colors
Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 10 Pairs Magnetic Eyelash Natural Look, Upgraded 3D False Lashes Magnetic Eyeliner Kit with Tweezers and 2pcs Magnetic Eyeliner, Reusable, No Glue
Mussozy
{'Brand': 'Mussozy', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9 x 6 x 0.6 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 0.6 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '766779448732'}
I have been using magnetic lashes for about a year, and I never thought they would look, and work so well. Once you apply the liquid magnetic base, you can try different lashes, to see which pair matches up with your makeup, and wardrobe. This might sound like extra work, but that is the whole point of these. They are extremely easy to apply, and swap. They really look great, and I finally gave them a try, and wear them all the time.
Really great set of magnetic eyelashes

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user has a strong interest in beauty and personal care products, particularly those that enhance natural features like eyelashes and eyebrows, with a focus on growth and thickness-promoting items for a defined and voluminous appearance. They appreciate aesthetically pleasing packaging and ease of application, balancing functionality with visual appeal. Their recent purchase of a set of magnetic eyelashes highlights their enthusiasm for innovative beauty trends, emphasizing both the convenience of application and the ability to experiment with various styles.

In addition to their love for eyelash products, the user is expanding their interests to include nail care, as demonstrated by their acquisition of a dip powder kit, and hair accessories, with a colorful set of headbands that support their goal of self-expression. The user prioritizes quality, performance, and usability, reflecting an evolving approach to self-care that emphasizes creativity and innovation.

Their commitment to high-quality tools is also evident in their previous purchase of makeup sponges, showcasing a desire for flawless makeup application. Overall, the user seeks beauty solutions that enhance their natural features and foster personal expression, highlighting a commitment to practical yet stylish enhancements in their beauty regimen.
